text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-resprate

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP72199-0 (Breaths), PROPERTY = LP6839-7 (NRat), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP309823-5 (Breaths^resting), PROPERTY = LP6839-7 (NRat), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)

name: VitalSignsRespRate
title: Vital Signs - Respiratory Rate
description: This value set defines the set of LOINC codes considered to be appropriate for representing respiratory rate vital sign measurements in Observation.code.
